description: This code is a set of modules designed to detect certain classes of cyber attacks against equipment in power distribution grid substations, including attacks against transformer tap changers and capacitor bank switches, as well as "reconnaissance" attacks against equipment in power grid substations.
name: Analytics for Stream-Processing Architecture for Real-time Cyber-physical Security (Analytic-SPARCS) v0.9

permissions.exemptionText: This source code is restricted by patent and / or intellectual property law.
